actions.text: Amendment SA 638 under the order of 7/26/2023, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 2. Record Vote Number: 208.
Amendment SA 638 proposed by Senator Menendez to Amendment SA 935. (consideration: CR S3724) To reauthorize the Firefighter Cancer Registry Act of 2018.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 638 proposed by Senator Menendez to Amendment SA 935.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 638 under the order of 7/26/2023, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 2. Record Vote Number: 208.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 638 under the order of 7/26/2023, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 2. Record Vote Number: 208.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To reauthorize the Firefighter Cancer Registry Act of 2018.
